professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle 11g/12c, RAC, ASM, and DataGuard. Proficient in SQL, PL/SQL, and shell scripting. Strong focus on performance tuning, disaster recovery, and database security.

key_responsibilities: Performing database migrations to ASM and managing disk groups for high availability.
Implementing backup and recovery strategies using RMAN and Data Pump.
Managing user permissions and implementing security best practices.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Criminal Justice
